songs.title: Fuck the Police
songs.lyrics:
Fuck the police
Comin' straight from the underground
A young nigg*
Got it bad cause he's brown
Fuck the police (2x)

I said fuck that shit
Cause I ain’t the one
For a punk motherfucker
With a badge and a gun
To be beaten on (4x) a real nigg*
You'd rather see me in a pen
Than me and Lorenzo
Rollin in a benz-o
(Fight it!)
In a benz-ooo
See, I don’t even know
If they fags or what
A search a nigg* down and grabbin' his nuts
And I said “Yeah"
I said "Fuck the police”

Fuck the police
Fuck the police
I said:
"Fuck the police, you can't catch a real
Nigg* like me" (2x)
